On length, time and space

May 16, 2014

Nothing is infinite.
Not the Sea, not the Sun.
Not the soil we stand on.
Not the life, not the laugh,
Not your smile.

Not even our sorrow is infinite.
Not our happiness.
Not the truth or the lies,
nor the death.

Not the love or the hate,
not me and you.
Not this.
